definitions.body: king (NH id.; MI:1. 5. 10. 18. 23 [[מלך]]; l:4 [[המלכן]]; Ph. [[מלך]]; Zinj. [[מלך]] DHM:Sendsch. 60; As. maliku, malku, prince (As. sûarru = king); Ar. malikun king (orig. Heb. …[[מַלִח]] inferred, Lag:BN 73 Ba:NB § 112 WMM:As. u. Europ. 76); Sab. [[מלכן]] Sab Denkm:No. 1; cstr. [[מלך]], pl. [[אמלך]] CIS:iv 37; cf. Eth. 0aml4k: God (and Nö:l. c.); Aram. mlik, [[מְלֵיךְ]]; Palm. [[מלך מלכא]] Vog:No. 28; Nab. [[מלכא]] Eut:Nab.1);—´[[מ]] abs. Ge 14:7 + (ins. also 2Sa 13:17 LXX Th We Dr Kit Bu, and v:2Sa 13:34 LXX We Dr Kit Bu); in p. alw. [[מֶָלֶךְ]] Ge 49:20 + 238 t. (so also n. pr. in [[מֶלֶךְ]]-); cstr. Ge 14:1 +; sf. [[מַלְכִּי]] 2Sa 19:44 + 6 t., etc.; pl. [[מְלָכִים]] Ge 14:9 +; [[מְלָכִין]] Pr 31:3; cstr. [[מַלְכֵי]] Ge 17:16 +; sf. [[מְלָכֶיהָ]] Is 7:16 + 3 t.; [[מַלְכֵיהֶם]] De 7:24 + 16 t., etc.;—

king: of Egypt Ge 39:20 f. Ex 1:8 f. De 11:3, 1Ki 3:1; of Mesopotamia, Shinar, Assyr., Babyl., Pers., etc. Ju Jdg 3:8, Jdg 3:10, Ge 14:1 f. 2Ki 15:19, 2Ki 15:20, 2Ki 15:29, 2Ki 17:3 f. 2Ki 18:13 f. 2Ki 24:1, 2Ki 24:11 f. Ezr 1:1 f. Ezr 4:3 f. Es 1:2 +, 1Ki 11:18, 1Ki 11:40, 1Ki 14:25, 2Ki 17:4 f. 2Ki 23:29 +; of Canaan, Philist., Edom, Moab, etc. (often of single city): Ge 14:2 f. v:Ge 14:18, Ge 20:2, Ge 26:1, Ge 26:8, Ge 36:31, Nu 20:14, Nu 21:1 f. Nu 22:4, Nu 22:10, De 1:4, De 3:1 f. Jos 2:2 (oft. in Jos), Ju Jdg 1:7, Jdg 5:19, Jdg 8:5, Jdg 8:12, Jdg 11:12 f. 2Ki 3:4 f. +; of Aram, Hamath, etc. 2Sa 8:3 f. v:2Sa 8:9, 1Ki 15:18, 1Ki 20:1 f. 1Ki 22:3, 2Ki 5:1 f. 2Ki 8:7 f. v:2Ki 8:29, 2Ki 9:14, 2Ki 9:15, 2Ki 15:37, 2Ki 16:5 f. +; of Tyre, etc. 2Sa 5:11, 1Ki 5:15, 1Ki 9:11 1Ki 16 +, etc.; esp. of Israel (undivided, and of both divisions) Ge 36:31, Nu 23:21, Nu 24:7, De 17:14 f. Ju Jdg 17:6, Jdg 18:1, Jdg 19:1, Jdg 21:25, 1Sa 2:10, 1Sa 8:5 f. 2Sa 2:4 f. 1Ki 1:33, 1Ki 1:34 f. + very often; cf. also Ju Jdg 9:5.—2Sa 18:29 b del. ´[[הַמּ]] We Klo Dr Kit Bu. Note that in early books [[המלך דוד]] is nearly always said; in late books usually [[המלך]] (´[[שׁלמה וגו]]) [[דוד]]; cf. Aram. [[כּוֹרֶשׁ מַלְכָּא]], etc.

of Davidic king, as under divine protection, 1Sa 2:10 (‖[[מְשִׁיחוֹ]]), Ps 2:6, Ps 18:51, Ps 89:19, Ps 61:7, cf. Ps 99:4; so in (Messianic) prediction Ho 3:5, Is 32:1, Je 23:5, Ez Eze 37:22, Eze 37:24, Zec 9:9.
in fable, king of trees Ju Jdg 9:8, Jdg 9:15 fig. of crocodile Job 41:26; [[אֵין לָאַרְבֶּה]] ´[[מ]] Pr 30:27; of death, [[מֶלֶךְ בַּלָּהוֹת]] Job 18:14.
